title: Abadh sukhdAyi
sahitya:
Abadh sukhdAyi ab bAjE badhAi


caraNam 1    ratna simhAsan kE pAr raghupati sItA sahit suhAyO 
rAm bharat sumitrAnandan ThADE camar catur DulAyO
   caraNam 2    gAv gAv jan mangal gAvat dEvan bajAyO 
rAm rAvaN mArE asur sab mArE rAjA vibhISaN pAyO
    caraNam 3    mAtA kausalyA karat AratiI nij man vAncit pAyO 
rAm padmanAbh prabhu phaNi par shAyi tribhuvan sukh kari AyO
